titles.title: Buy American Improvement Act of 1996
To apply the Buy American Act to articles, materials, and supplies for use outside the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

bill.summary: 9/27/1996--Introduced. Buy American Improvement Act of 1996 - Amends the Buy American Act to make the Buy American requirements of such Act applicable to articles, materials, and supplies that Federal agencies purchase for use outside the United States.
